name: react-easy-universal
description: Universal Routing & Rendering with React & Redux was too hard. Now it's easy.

scripts.clean: rimraf build && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/static && cp source/test/fixtures/index.html ./build/index.html
scripts.build:client: browserify source/test/fixtures/client.js -o build/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.prebuild:test: npm run -s clean && npm run -s build:client
scripts.build:test: browserify source/test/client/index.js -o build/static/browser-tests.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch: watch "clear && npm run lint -s && npm run test -s" source
scripts.watch:client: watch "clear && npm run lint -s && npm run -s test && npm run -s build:test" source
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm outdated --depth=0

author: Eric Elliott
